text.section: KRS 304.24-600 to 304.24-625 is not applicable to a reorganization or merger under KRS 304.37-505 and 304.37-510.

KRS 304.24-600 to 304.24-625 is applicable to demutualization of a mutual insurance holding company which resulted from the reorganization of a domestic mutual insurance company organized under Subtitle 24 of this chapter as if it were a mutual insurance company.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 17, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 546, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998.
